about.title: About Agendapp

updater.title: Update available
updater.text: You have version {{APP_VERSION}} and the latest is {{LATEST_VERSION}}. Click here to update.

restartRequired.title: Restart required
restartRequired.text: To apply changes, the app must be restarted.

placeholders.homework: Type here the content of whatever you want
placeholders.note: Type here some text to start taking note...

autostart.title: Open at start
autostart.description: Automatically open Agendapp in the background when your device starts.

enabled.windows: Agendapp will open itself in background when you start your device. You can change this setting in the task manager.
enabled.macos: Agendapp will open itself in background when you start your device. You can change this setting in the system preferences.
enabled.other: Agendapp will open itself in background when you start your device. You can change this setting in the system settings.

waitBeforeDeleteHomeworks.title: Delay before deleting homeworks
waitBeforeDeleteHomeworks.description: You will have 4 seconds after checking a homework to uncheck it before it is deleted.

forceBlurEffect.title: Force blur effect
forceBlurEffect.description: In case the background of the app becomes opaque at some moments. Not recommended otherwise.

language.title: App language
language.description: Language used to display texts in the application.

defaultTab.title: Default tab
defaultTab.description: The tab that will open by default when the application starts.

defaultOpenPath.title: Default path
defaultOpenPath.description: Default path when attaching a file through the CTRL+O shortcut.
